name: Business Development Manager
description:
The company develops and sells a number of our own IT products created from scratch. Our clients are located across the globe and primarily speak English. We have now decided to strengthen our business with a dedicated Business Development and Sales department which shall help us grow rapidly. However, we understand that it might be quite challenging to find a ready specialist with enough experience in our business field for our local Izhevsk office. That's why we're not assuming you have had any prior experience in a Business Development role before. You can grow together with our company, but the right candidate is expected to have Fluent English and motivated to learn quickly.

B2B:

  • Develop and maintain relationships with service providers, partners
  • Create and maintain the corporate website (ideas, conception, content)
  • Brand management: strategy, awareness, reputations, etc.
  • Drive the entire sales process from corporate website lead generation to successful closure of contracts
  • Fast creation of MVPs
  • Expanding both B2B and B2C projects into new regions and groups of customers
  • Attending industry events, shows and exhibitions as required from time to time
  • Create a framework for KPIs, goals and attribution for success
  • Prepare and present proposals and respond to customer queries in a professional way
  • Account management
  • Researching business field and preparing reviews of the most valued market trends and happenings

B2C:

  • Implement marketing techniques that will drive new customers
  • Implement marketing strategies to retain customers
  • Track marketing KPIs and P&L and provide reports to C-level on a regular basis
  • SMM and PR on behalf of B2C projects
  • Recruiting new affiliates, managing a portfolio of existing affiliates

Requirements:

  • Fluency in English (C2 or C1 level) is a must
  • Ability to learn quickly
  • Analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced startup-like environment with rapidly shifting priorities
  • Strong motivation and ability to work both independently and in collaboration
  • A clear focus on sales and business growth
